metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Elizabeth. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Jonathan Barrett CFP®, CLU®, ChFC®, RICP®, RPS®

heroDescription: Elizabeth, NJ, is a vibrant city known for its diverse community and strategic location near New York City.
landscapeDescription: With a population of 127,558, Elizabeth serves as a key economic hub in New Jersey, benefiting from its proximity to major metropolitan areas. The local economy is bolstered by logistics, retail, and manufacturing sectors.
uniqueNeeds: Elizabeth requires tailored financial strategies to address its diverse economic landscape and community needs.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Elizabeth's logistics focus poses risks from economic downturns. Real estate may face volatility; monitor housing trends. Flooding is a concern—diversify investments.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Elizabeth's economy is growing steadily, driven by increased logistics and retail activities.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Elizabeth is approximately $66,000, reflecting a diverse income distribution.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Elizabeth are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and real estate investments.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), the cost of living in Elizabeth is moderate, with housing being a significant factor.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the real estate market in Elizabeth shows signs of growth, but affordability remains a concern for many residents.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Elizabeth's business climate is favorable, with incentives for logistics and retail businesses.
